directions: To assemble tart, spread filling evenly into cooled crust. Top with asparagus-ham-arugula mixture and serve.
ingredients: Bake crust until golden brown, about 12 minutes. Cool.
Drop in large pan of salted boiling water. Cook 3 minutes; drain. Cool in bowl of ice water. Drain, then slice each spear into 4 or 5 pieces:
8 ounces thinly sliced ham, cut into thin strips
title: Mascarpone, Ham, and Asparagus Tart
